name: Sonic Z-Treme
overview: Sonic Z-Treme is a new game for the Sega Saturn inspired by the ill-fated Sonic X-Treme. While Sonic X-Treme relied on sprites and the fisheye view camera and worked correctly only on pc, this game relies heavily on 3D, including the player's model and enemy models, while also aiming for a stable 30 FPS on the Sega Saturn. This game also includes a splitscreen multiplayer mode where you can either play the full game versus or coop!
